remarks: Define the set of algebraic numbers.  An algebraic number is a root of a nonzero polynomial over the integers.  Here we construct it as the union of all kernels (preimages of ` { 0 } ` ) of all polynomials in ` ( Poly `` ZZ ) ` , except the zero polynomial ` 0p ` .
